channel.title: 317 pi exp help
channel.description:
I wanna try and make it where let say when some1 is trianing melle range, or mage they will get example, like 2k exp, but when they are pking its set to 4 exp the normal runescape exp the reason why i want this is, because when people pk in runescape you know how much exp your about to hit so thats when you take out your spec wep so is there a way this can be done??
Please and thank you
